Handles rendering, sprite-sheet splicing, culling, collision, and...

item.title: README
item.description: Step by step instructions to reproduce this website! - Public Resume Website Hosting We will be publically hosting a Resume written in markdown. There are great advantages to hosting a Resume website as opposed to storing and submitting a PDF. Websites can be updated almost instantaniously, whereas a PDF needs to be resubmitted and version control is harder to...
